Event.Message: Default gateway is set on %1 (%2 Family: %3 GatewayIP: %5 GatewayMAC: %7 KnownProxyless: %8 KnownHotspot: %9 KnownOppInternet: %10 KnownProxiedOppInternet: %11)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="IfLuid" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Family" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="IpAddressLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="IpAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:SocketAddress" length="IpAddressLength"/> <data name="MacAddressLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MacAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="MacAddressLength"/> <data name="KnownProxyless" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="KnownHotspot" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="KnownOppInternet" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="KnownProxiedOppInternet" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: Preferred address change on %1 (%2 Family: %3 HasPreferredAddress: %4 AddressSuffixOrigins: %5)

Event.Message: Preferred global address change on %1 (%2 Family: %3 HasPreferredGlobalAddress: %4 AddressSuffixOrigins: %5)
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="IfLuid" inType="win:UInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="Family" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HasPreferredGlobalAddress" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="AddressSuffixOrigins" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>
